dialogueText: The scene shifts around you.
Great bamboo stalks fly up into the sky all around you as a great forest erupts from the ground.
In no time at all, you are in the middle of the vast bamboo forests of the Realm of Endless Night.
It's quiet, and in the stillness you can hear soft voices calling out to you, though the words are always just below the threshold of hearing.
You cannot make out what they are saying.
In the distance is a light and you make your way towards it.
Eventually, you find Kaguya.
The princess seems sad. You ask her what is wrong.
Dreamer... I was born here, but I never truly belonged to this realm.
She didn't? Then where does she belong?
Kaguya points straight up, indicating the moon high above.
As you look at it, you realise the moon isn't really a moon at all. It is a circular patch of light, like a hole in the night sky, with daylight streaming from beyond.
You can hear the distant sound of voices drifting through the hole.
Even though I don't belong here, I truly wish to stay... Will you please let me stay, Dreamer?
You look back at Kaguya to ask her what she means, but she is gone, leaving you alone amidst the bamboo stalks.
Feeling sad, you continue through the bamboo until you come across another wooden gate.
This one is free standing, but it is surrounded by impenetrable darkness.
On the gate are more golden symbols...
"Yea, all which it inherit shall dissolve..."
It does feel like things are beginning to dissolve...
As you push open the gate, it really does dissolve into the darkness... and from that darkness marches an army of Dreamless.
쓰러진 드락의 몸 위로 대나무 줄기들이 자라나 하늘을 덮는다.
부름에 응해준 카구야가 검집 안으로 칼을 밀어 넣으며 짧은 한숨을 몰아쉰다.
탑의 둥근 지붕이 있던 자리에 불길하게 빛나는 초승달이 걸려있다.
아직 저물지 않은 석양 때문에 카구야의 발아래로 긴 그림자가 깔렸다.
여기는...
마법의 왕국과 끝없는 밤의 세계 사이에 있던 숲인가?
잔잔히 미소 짓는 카구야를 향해 감사 인사를 건네자
천천히 고개를 가로저으며 달이 없는 방향을 향해 먼저 걸음을 옮긴다.
그렇다고 너무 안심하지는 마세요, 그대. 소녀가 동행할 수 있는 것은 여기까지랍니다. 이제 무운을 빌어드리는 것 외에는 할 수 있는 것이 없군요.
카구야가 검 끝으로 하늘의 초승달을 가리켰다.
... 아니, 자세히 보니 저건 달이 아니다. 초승달처럼 생긴 균열 사이로 빛이 새어 들어와 달처럼 보이는 것뿐이다.
그대와 저는 한번 의식이 겹쳤던 적이 있었지요, 그때의 경험 덕분이랍니다. 누군가를 간절히 찾는 그대의 목소리가 제게 닿았거든요. 오로라 씨가 길을 터주었어요.
그 속에서 타마모노마에의 이름을 부르며 흐느끼는 사피의 목소리가 들렸다.
... 끝없는 밤의 세계에 가까워진 모양이다.
그대를 도와드릴 수 있어 기뻤답니다, 꿈꾸는 자. 조금 더 이야기를 나누고 싶지만, 서두르시는 편이 좋겠어요. 마인드 스톤의 상태가 그리 좋지 않아요. 이대로라면 기억의 틈에 갇히고 말테죠.
지금 출구를 찾아드릴게요, 꿈꾸는 자. 이전보다 훨씬 흐려진 오로라의 목소리가 멀리서 들려온다.
길 끝에 밤의 세계만큼이나 어두운 문이 나타났다.
문 손잡이 아래에는 영원한 꿈이라 쓰여있다.
찬란한 영광, 생명의 요람, 영원한 꿈...
영역의 도미니언과 스톤들의 관계를 암시하는 걸까?
문을 넘어가려던 때 초승달 같았던 균열을 비집고 드림리스와 악몽들이 파도처럼 쏟아졌다.
쿄의 사나운 웃음소리가 숲에 메아리친다.
The scene shifts around you.
Great bamboo stalks fly up into the sky all around you as a great forest erupts from the ground.
In no time at all, you are in the middle of the vast bamboo forests of the Realm of Endless Night.
It's quiet, and in the stillness you can hear soft voices calling out to you, though the words are always just below the threshold of hearing.
You cannot make out what they are saying.
In the distance is a light and you make your way towards it.
Eventually, you find Kaguya.
The princess seems sad. You ask her what is wrong.
Dreamer... I was born here, but I never truly belonged to this realm.
She didn't? Then where does she belong?
Kaguya points straight up, indicating the moon high above.
As you look at it, you realise the moon isn't really a moon at all. It is a circular patch of light, like a hole in the night sky, with daylight streaming from beyond.
You can hear the distant sound of voices drifting through the hole.
Even though I don't belong here, I truly wish to stay... Will you please let me stay, Dreamer?
You look back at Kaguya to ask her what she means, but she is gone, leaving you alone amidst the bamboo stalks.
Feeling sad, you continue through the bamboo until you come across another wooden gate.
This one is free standing, but it is surrounded by impenetrable darkness.
On the gate are more golden symbols...
"Yea, all which it inherit shall dissolve..."
It does feel like things are beginning to dissolve...
As you push open the gate, it really does dissolve into the darkness... and from that darkness marches an army of Dreamless.
